channel.title: Presidential Election of 2024 on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in Presidential Election of 2024 on PepsFeeder

item.title: Biden Visits a Military Cemetery in France That Trump Once Snubbed
item.description: President Joe Biden visited the Aisne-Marne American Cemetery and Memorial in France on Sunday, a military cemetery that former President Donald Trump skipped during a visit to the country in 2018.

item.title: The E.U. Is Voting. It’s Never Mattered More.
item.description: The European Union is holding its first-ever direct elections for the European Parliament. The results will determine the direction of the 27-nation bloc for the next five years.

item.title: After Trump’s Conviction, a Wary World Waits for the Fallout
item.description: The verdict in the impeachment trial of former President Donald J. Trump was a foregone conclusion. The question now is what it means for the United States and the world.
